Header.title: Professional Carpet & Upholstery Care
Header.paragraph: Revive, sanitise and protect your carpets with eco‑friendly deep cleaning trusted across the UK.

About.paragraph: We specialise in advanced, eco‑responsible carpet and soft furnishing cleaning for homes, offices and managed properties throughout the UK. Using low‑moisture and hot water extraction systems, hospital‑grade sanitation and fibre‑safe detergents, we restore freshness, extend textile life and create healthier indoor environments. Our trained technicians follow rigorous multi‑stage processes that lift embedded soil, allergens, bacteria and odours while safeguarding delicate fibres and backings.

Services.name: Eco Hot Water Extraction
Services.text: Deep fibre flush using industry leading, low-residue solutions that lift soil, allergens and bacteria while protecting backings.

Services.name: Stain & Spot Treatment
Services.text: Targeted chemistry for coffee, wine, oil, rust and pet accidents with fibre-safe neutralisation to prevent re-wicking.

Services.name: Pet Odour Neutralising
Services.text: Enzyme & oxidising treatments that break down organic odours at source— not masking with perfume.

Services.name: End of Tenancy Packages
Services.text: Rapid turnaround carpet & upholstery refresh that helps secure deposits and meet managing agent standards.

Services.name: Allergy & Sanitising Rinse
Services.text: Hypoallergenic neutral rinse plus antimicrobial application reducing dust mites, spores and common irritants.

Services.name: Upholstery & Sofa Care
Services.text: Gentle multi-stage fabric cleansing restoring brightness and softness to sofas, chairs and soft furnishings.
